about_the_game:
Rose Cottage is classic point and click ghost story, set in a Victorian mortuary. Play as Detective Inspector Edward Barrington as he investigates Hollow Lane Mortuary. What starts as a simple missing persons case soon becomes a night he will never forget.

It is November 11th 1910 and Edward receives a call for help from his Father in Law Thomas Gray of the Hollow Lane Mortuary. It seems that all of the mortuary staff have vanished without a trace, all three at the same time! Edward travels to the mortuary to investigate what he assumes to be a missing persons case, he will soon find out that there is much more to the disappearances.


"Thomas said the manor will be locked and that he will not be able to return tonight to let me in, He said I may be able to enter through the cellar door. Looks like I'm on my own..." -Edwards Case Notes.

- A classic style point and click adventure
- Over 40 Hand drawn locations in the demo alone, available in 4K resolution
- Over 200 bespoke character animations
- Haunting original music
- A cast of fully voiced characters
- Streamlined two button point and click interface with optional highlighting of interactions
